name: Perfect Racer
description:
Are you ready to drive amazing cars in the city?
Now you can drive in interrior camera mode

Completely realistic car game fiction.

GAME FEATURES

- Realistic city traffic
- Custom color modification
- Excellent detailed cars
- Realistic car driving experience
- Excellent 4 sport car, 2 classic car, 1 american car
- 7 Levels
- 3 km length roads
- Smooth and realistic car handling
- Realistic car sound effects
- 3 different camera
- Real traffic rules (Crosswalk, Traffic Police, Speed Limit)
- Driving in Rainy, Foggy and Snowy weathers
- Drive by accelerometer or realistic wheel
- Stunning 3d graphics
- Multi Language Support
- Night and day car driving
- Car Drive on the highway traffic
- Large City Maps

A great Perfect Racer : Car Driving is now available.

GAMEPLAY INSTRUCTIONS

- Tilt or Touch to steer
- Touch gas button to accelerate
- Touch brake button to slow down


TIPS
- Complete levels as fast as possible to gain more money and score
- Overtake cars to gain more score
